channel.title: Task-Parameterized on Markus Knauer
channel.description: Recent content in Task-Parameterized on Markus Knauer

item.title: *Demonstration*: Showing a task-parameterized approach at Automatica and Hannover fair
item.description:
Automatica 2023 & Hannover fair 2024 Link to heading

Presenting a robotic demonstrator at a trade fair is always exciting! ðŸš€

At Automatica 2023 in Munich and Hannover fair 2024 in Hannover I presented an implementation of a Task-Parameterized approach (TP-GMM [1]) at the booth of the Institute of Robotics and Mechatronics of the German Aerospace Center (DLR) in the domain of future manufacturing. The demonstration showed a ring-measuring task, where the robot arm picks a bearing ring from a box and places it onto a measuring device. Thanks to the task-parameterized approach a generalization to different box and measuring-device positions was possible, which was necessary since we are showing a variable workcell, where changes can and will always happen.
